title: THOUGHT / REMOTE VIEWER
description: Inland Empire -- Happens on a counter now.

links.title: You: "Yes."
links.text: Yes.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Of course you do. You don't even kn..."
links.text: Of course you do. You don't even know *what* it is you're feeling, but you can feel it. That's the mark of a true *Remote Viewer*...

links.title: Inland Empire: "The time has come to *connect* to R..."
links.text: The time has come to *connect* to RVD HQ. By establishing a connection you'll have proved yourself worthy as a Remote Viewer...

links.title: You: "Close your eyes."
links.text: Close your eyes.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything alright, detective?""
links.text: "Everything alright, detective?"

links.title: You: ""Shhh... I'm trying to connect with..."
links.text: "Shhh... I'm trying to connect with the Remote Viewers Division."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This again? Come on, detective. Th..."
links.text: "This again? Come on, detective. The joke has gone on long enough."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Ignore the lieutenant. He's never c..."
links.text: Ignore the lieutenant. He's never connected with anything para-natural. You're on different planes, metaphysically speaking.

links.title: You: "Keep your eyes shut."
links.text: Keep your eyes shut.

links.title: You: "Open your eyes. [Discard thought.]"
links.text: Open your eyes. [Discard thought.]

links.title: You: ""Yeah, just resting my eyes." [Disc..."
links.text: "Yeah, just resting my eyes." [Discard thought.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It has been a long day." The lieut..."
links.text: "It has been a long day." The lieutenant looks down at his wristwatch.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is rather late." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "It is rather late." The lieutenant looks down at his wristwatch.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A little early in the day for a na..."
links.text: "A little early in the day for a nap, isn't it?" The lieutenant frowns at his wristwatch.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It takes time to block out the soun..."
links.text: It takes time to block out the sounds of the world. But once you do, it's like you're on a wavelength. Not like any *natural* wavelength. No. There seems to be *something* on the other end, if only you could listen closely enough...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, for god's sake. This is a bunc..."
links.text: "Oh, for god's sake. This is a bunch of..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "*BZZZZT*. Do you copy? This is RVD..."
links.text: *BZZZZT*. Do you copy? This is RVD HQ. Anyone there?

links.title: You: "Uh... is this the Remote Viewers Di..."
links.text: Uh... is this the Remote Viewers Division?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Acknowledged. Connection establishe..."
links.text: Acknowledged. Connection established. *BZZZZT*. Welcome aboard, Remote Viewer. You are a special man, and *definitely* not imagining it.

links.title: You: "(Clear throat.) RVD HQ, this is Fir..."
links.text: (Clear throat.) RVD HQ, this is Firewalker. Reporting for duty.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Can it be? We haven't heard that na..."
links.text: Can it be? We haven't heard that name in ages. Welcome to the RVD, Firewalker. *BZZZZZT*. You are a special man, and *definitely* not imagining it.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "... must have been... para-natural..."
links.text: ... must have been... para-natural static. Ghosts... in the wires... Kill the connection... *BZZZZT*.

links.title: Logic: "That *something* is the sound of yo..."
links.text: That *something* is the sound of your brain cells giving their two weeks' notice.

links.title: You: "I'm good where I am. [Discard thoug..."
links.text: I'm good where I am. [Discard thought.]

links.title: You: "Feel what?"
links.text: Feel what?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Close your eyes. Reach out with you..."
links.text: Close your eyes. Reach out with your *feelings*. There's something *para-natural* at play here.

links.title: Shivers: "NONSENSE."
links.text: NONSENSE.

links.title: You: "You're right. I feel it now."
links.text: You're right. I feel it now.

links.title: You: "This sounds like a load of garbage...."
links.text: This sounds like a load of garbage. [Discard thought.]
